title: Dell lifts annual forecasts on AI server sales boom

content:

title: AI Apocalypse? Why language surrounding tech is sounding increasingly religious
description: Geoffrey Hinton is sounding the alarm about the risks of artificial intelligence
content:

title: Microsoft Launches MAI-1-Preview, MAI-Voice-1 AI Models: Features, Performance And Other Key Details
description: Microsoft has introduced two new in-house AI models, MAI-Voice-1 and MAI-1-preview. This marks a shift towards building its own artificial intelligence capabilities, reducing reliance on OpenAI. MAI-Voice-1 is designed to generate audio quickly and efficiently. The MAI-1-preview model is now in public testing and ranks 13th on LMArena, a benchmark for language models. In a blog post on Thursday, the company said its goal is to create technology that empowers people everywhere.
content:

title: Intelligence With Empathy: How AI Is Changing the Face of Insurance
description: Insurance used to be synonymous with forms, queues and delays. Today, artificial intelligence is beginning to untangle that experience – not just by digitising steps, but by redesigning the journey around people.
content: For most of us, insurance has always felt like a duty rather than a choice. You fill out long forms, sign pages you don’t fully understand, and then wait. If you’re lucky, things go smoothly; if not, you get stuck chasing someone for updates. This is... [8859 chars]

title: Artificial Intelligence Boom Lures Kazakhstan’s Oil Wealth
description: Kazakhstan is preparing to channel some of its national wealth into artificial intelligence infrastructure, joining a global rush where venture capital firms and energy-rich states are betting billions on the sector despite volatility and surging valuations.
